content: 1 cycloom a fantasy creature inspired by the works of my dear friend micha @maschenlumpi to whom i dedicate this pattern a cycloom is magical with his big eye he watches you and everything that happens but he does not judge you he asks you to change places with him to look at yourself or the situation from a different perspective the cycloom helps you to understand yourself and others better so that you can find a way to deal with situations that were previously difficult for you the cycloom feels most comfortable in forests however wild forms have also been seen to adapted to the neon lights of the cities with their colours it is even said that some like to live by the water that remains to be seen @thenickcole 2 cycloom materials i used o 2 5 mm crochet hook o yarn in cream or dark red body nude tattoos reddish brown cap moss green moss i used a fluffy yarn of course you can choose your own colours o thread in gold or silver scales o safety eyes in 20 mm you can also crochet an eye see page 10 o scissors needle stitch marker o stuffing o piece of cardboard abbreviations us terms  single_crochet single_crochet  double_crochet double_crochet  half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  fpdc front post double_crochet fpdc  magic_ring magic_ring  increase increase  decrease decrease  *n repeat instructions n-times  fo fasten_off spikest  ws wrong side  st stitch  chain chain  slip_stitch slip_stitch  blo back loops only  spikest single_crochet over the st in the current round to the st in the the previous round we will use french knots to do the scales and surface slip stitches or chain stitch embroidery for the tattoos crochet in continuous rounds until otherwise stated @thenickcole 3 top with body colour 1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet = 6 2 increase*6 = 12 3 single_crochet increase *6 = 18 4 2sc increase *6 = 24 fo weave in tail body with body colour 1 magic_ring 6sc = 6 2 increase*6 = 12 3 single_crochet increase *6 = 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet *6 = 24 5 3sc increase *6 = 30 6 2sc increase 2sc *6 = 36 7 5sc increase *6 = 42 8 blo 42sc = 42 9 3sc increase 3sc *6 = 48 you might add a piece of cardboard 10 48sc = 48 or plastic or wood here 11 48sc = 48 to prevent the bottom from bulging 12 3sc decrease 3sc *6 = 42 13 42sc = 42 14 5sc decrease *6 = 36 15 36sc = 36 16 17sc ch2 skip 2sts 17sc = 36 if you use the crocheted eye 17 2sc decrease 2sc *6 = 30 just single_crochet 36 in round 16 18 30sc = 30 19 30sc = 30 20 3sc decrease *6 = 24 21 24sc = 24 22 24sc = 24 @thenickcole 4 insert eye between rounds 15 and 16 through the
